about_the_game:
Street's Disciple is a battle platform fighter for up to 1-4 players in LOCAL and LAN or CPU
Play two players with two controllers versus two computer controlled characters

An exciting full on thriller for the whole family!

Mission is to regain control over the ark of the convenient. Steal back the treasure from the evil Hansoon who controls the nights templar in the spirit of the temple of the kings in the most import tournament of humanity!

1 character
Ninja

Choose between 5 levels
Map 1 Mansion Conflict Zone
Map 2 Heaven Concluding Ground
Map 3 Jungle Battle Place
Map 4 Theatre The Walk Way
Map 5 Ice Zone
(+Random choice)

name: Street's Disciple Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4095MB NVIDIA GeForce
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: High Definition Audio
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 4820K @ 3.70GHz
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4095MB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: NVIDIA High Definition Audio

Steal back the treasure from the evil Hansoon who controls the nights templar in the spirit of the temple of the kings in the most import tournament.
